form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Bank of America National Bankers Association

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/30/2023 Cable Address - BANKAMERICA Bank of America NATIONAL TAVINGS ASSOCIATION LOS ANGELES MAIN OFFICE . 660 SOUTH SPRING STREET . LOS ANGELES. CALIFORNIA 90014 November 13, 1968 American Consul Hong Kong Dear Sir: At the request of Mrs. Grace Chinn we are pleased to give you the following information in regard to her savings account maintained at this office. Mrs. Chinn opened her savings account on March 2, 1966 and at the present time the balance is $9,297.37. Mrs. Chinn came to us properly identified, and her account has been handled in a satisfactory manner. Sincerely, Ben Cameron Pro-Assistant Cashier BC/tk Subscription and tomato day of MARTHA E. MILLER NOTARY PUBLIC in and for the County of Los Angeles, State of California My Commission Expires June 21, 1971 MARTHA E. MILLER NOTARY PUBLIC STATE OF CALIFORNIA COUNTY OF LOS ANGELES
